isis.stitle: 8 SPEED, 9 SPEED, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - REASSEMBLE - COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLIES

note.para: Except for the PTO gears, the left and right countershaft assemblies are identical and reassembled in the same manner.

step1.para: If previously removed, install the roll pin and key in the keyway of the countershaft ( Figure 339).

figure.caption: Figure 338. Install Roll Pin and Key in Keyway of Countershaft

step1.para: Align the keyway of the gear with the key in the countershaft and press the 1st speed gear on shaft, long hub of the gear to the front of the countershaft ( Figure 340).

figure.caption: Figure 339. Press 1st Speed Gear on Shaft

step1.para: Press the 2nd speed gear on the countershaft, long hub of gear against 1st speed gear hub ( Figure 341).

figure.caption: Figure 340. Press 2nd Speed Gear on Countershaft

step1.para: Press the 3rd speed gear on the countershaft, long hub of the gear to the front of the shaft ( Figure 342).

figure.caption: Figure 341. Press 3rd Speed Gear on Countershaft

step1.para: Start the PTO gear onto the countershaft, bullet-nose side of teeth facing up and toward the rear of the shaft ( Figure 343). Align keyway of the drive gear with the key in the countershaft and press BOTH gears onto the shaft, long hub of the drive gear against PTO gear.

figure.caption: Figure 342. Start PTO Gear onto Countershaft

note.para: The left countershaft assembly has a 47-tooth PTO gear; the right countershaft assembly has a 45-tooth PTO gear.

figure.caption: Figure 343. Mark End of Left Countershaft With "L" and Right Countershaft With "R"

step1.para: Install the drive gear retaining snap ring in the groove on the front of each countershaft ( Figure 345).

figure.caption: Figure 344. Install Drive Gear Retaining Snap Ring

step1.para: For models equipped with roller-type front bearings, use a rubber mallet or flanged-end driver to install the bearing inner race on the shaft, shoulder of race against the shoulder of the countershaft ( Figure 346).

figure.caption: Figure 345. Install Bearing Inner Race on Shaft
